unionFootnotes.*: Sedgwick is part of Heintzelman’s III Corps in this scenario

confederateFootnotes.*: All Confederate infantry, wagon train and artillery units start the game at Fatigue Level 1 on their normal sides.
JR Anderson and Branch begin the game on their exhausted sides at Fatigue Level 0
confederateFootnotes.+: 56 VA, 32 NC and the four “Richmond” units begin the game under Fort-Complete markers
confederateFootnotes.^: Huger, Armistead, 32 NC and the four “Richmond” units may not be moved until “Released”

unionFootnotes.*: 93NY begins the game under a Fort-Complete marker
unionFootnotes.^: King, McCall, Ricketts, 2 NY and 4PA begin the game on their exhausted sides at Fatigue Level 0

confederateFootnotes.*: McLaws, Ripley and Walker have special movement restrictions: see Rules 4 and 5.
confederateFootnotes.^: McLaws begins the game underneath a Breastworks-complete marker

unionFootnotes.*: The 2-5 US and 11PA cavalry units begin the game with disorganized strength markers.
unionFootnotes.^: The 93 NY infantry unit begins the game underneath a Fort-complete marker.

confederateFootnotes.*: Indicated units begin the game under Breastwork complete markers
confederateFootnotes.^: Indicated units begin the game under Fort-Complete markers
confederateFootnotes.$: Indicated units begin the game at Fatigue Level 3 (normal sides)
confederateFootnotes.+: Indicated units may not activate or entrench until released (see Rule 9)

unionFootnotes.^: 93NY begins the game under a Fort-Complete marker
unionFootnotes.*: Indicated units begin the game under Breastwork-Complete markers

confederateFootnotes.*: Indicated units begin the game at Fatigue Level 1 on their exhausted side.

unionFootnotes.*: Indicated units begin the game under a Breastworks-Complete marker.
unionFootnotes.^: 93NY begins the game under a Fort-Complete marker.
unionFootnotes.$: Naglee may not activate or entrench on Turn 1.

confederateFootnotes.*: Indicated units begin the game under Breastwork-complete markers.

unionFootnotes.*: Morell, McCall and Slocum begin the game with disorganized strength markers
unionFootnotes.^: Indicated units begin the game under Breastwork-complete markers
unionFootnotes.$: Ferry may not activate or entrench on Turn 1
